MajorClaims.Text: I myself prefer to spend my leisure time outdoors
I myself choose outdoor activities to spend my leisure time

Claims.Text: it is good for health and keep my body fit
outdoor activities enable me to socialize with other people and enjoy natural beauty
doing outdoor activities such as soccer and baseball is good for one's health
Outdoor activities not only improves my health but also gives me chances to communicate with more people
you can also enjoy the beautiful nature when doing some outdoor activities like going hiking, sunbathing, going biking
Spending time outdoors, people can breathe fresh air, feel the warm sun on their face and enjoy the complete peace that only nature brings
I can also have fun in indoor activities

Premises.Text: last year, I spent my summer time playing soccer and baseball
Playing baseball provided my upper body for hitting and throwing
Soccer, on the other hand, developed my lower body for kicking and endurance for playing full 90-minute-games
practicing these sports helped me greatly
playing these sports is to keep my body fit, make me ultimately refreshed
After that summer, my body is stronger and endurance is better
When I was ten years old, I was a shy girl
My mother took me to The National Camp
At first, I just ate and played alone
But on the third day, while I was swimming, a friendly girl came and greeted me, we became friend later and she taught me how to swim effectively
On the next day, we played together and she introduced me to her friends
Thanks to her and outdoor activities such as going skiing, climbing the mountain, I had a lot of friends since The National Camp
If, for example, I hadn't participate in that camping, I wouldn't have had many friends like today
If you spend your spare time at home or something like that, you can't enjoy beautiful nature
There's no doubt that indoor activities like reading a book, watching TV or listening to music can bring us lots of joy
this advantage cannot outweigh the attractions coming from outdoor activities
